jasima.shopSim.core

类 ShopListenerBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • jasima.shopSim.core.ShopListenerBase
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    SimComponentLifeCycleListener, NotifierListener<SimComponent,java.lang.Object>, ShopListener, java.lang.Cloneable
    直接已知子类:
    BasicJobStatCollector, BatchStatCollector, ExtendedJobStatCollector, ExtendedJobStatCollector, FlowtimePerProductCollector

    public abstract class ShopListenerBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements ShopListener, java.lang.Cloneable
    This class can be used as a base class for classes collecting results based on job releases/job completions.
    作者:
    Torsten Hildebrandt
    另请参阅:
    BasicJobStatCollector, ExtendedJobStatCollector
